title: On Generalised Danielewski and Asanuma varieties. (arXiv:2208.14238v3 [math.AC] UPDATED)
description: In this paper we extend a result of Dubouloz on the Cancellation Problem in higher dimensions ($\geqslant 2$) over the field of complex numbers to fields of arbitrary characteristic. We then apply the generalised result to describe the Makar-Limanov and Derksen invariant of generalised Asanuma varieties under certain hypotheses. We also establish a necessary and sufficient condition for certain generalised Asanuma varieties to be isomorphic to polynomial rings.
dc:creator: Parnashree Ghosh, Neena Gupta
